referenceObject.reference: Álvares, É. S. S., Loyola, R. D. & De Maria, M. (2005). A new species of the spider genus Aculepeira Chamberlin & Ivie (Araneae: Araneidae) found in nests of Trypoxylon (Trypargilum) lactitarse Saussure (Hymenoptera: Sphecidae) from Minas Gerais, Brazil.
